name: Vox Asteroids
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD or Arrows

Shoot: LeftMouseButton - Spacebar - T 

Asteroids!! Made for a challenge but also for practice since I'm still getting used to Unity and development in general.

This was pretty fun to make! Started learning particles and never thought that was how effects were made but it's pretty awesome and I'm very happy with what i got for now.

Shaders are looking scary for now but I'll give them a try next time.

It's nothing new but hope you like it.
